name: The Pixel Pulps Collection
summary: Influenced by 20th century pulp fiction and styled after 1980s home computer gaming graphics, Pixel Pulps transports you to strange and cryptic worlds not unlike our own... Explore the possibilities of interactive fiction in three unique stories, Mothmen 1966, Varney Lake, and Bahnsen Knights, all set within one eerie universe, and discover a fusion of exceptionally polished writing and strikingly unique visuals.
